Description: Plain weave fragment with brocading; decoration is of one band of heart-shaped motifs, alternatively yellow, green, purple and beige on a pink background; above and below the band are two similar freizes of stylised floral motifs, alternatively yellow and pink or green and yellow linked together with beige lines; warp-undyed linen (S/11), weft-undyed linen (S/9), plain weave is decorated with beige stripes of supplementary undyed linen weft (S/paired), weft brocading in undyed linen (S/grouped by 4) and pink, yellow, green and purple wool (S/paired); one finishing border has a warp fringe (c.6cm long), other edges are cut and ragged
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
